amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2014, LB749, § 298; Laws 2015, LB157, § 10. Operative date January 1, 2017. Act; applicability to qualified foreign corporations.
amendatorysection.para: A foreign corporation authorized to transact business in this state on January 1, 1996, shall be subject to the Business Corporation Act but shall not be required to obtain a new certificate of authority to transact business under the act.
